entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Blizzard developing after midnight. Blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:33 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:33 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Near blizzard. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 38 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:33 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023
